title: Two men gunned down in Kadawatha
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): Two people died in a shooting near the 9th post in Mahara along the Colombo – Kandy Main Road, on Thursday (Mar. 24) night, Sri Lanka Police said.
According to Police, two people who were travelling on a motorcycle were shot by two others who arrived on a motorcycle.
The two victims who sustained critical injuries in the shooting, died after being admitted to the Kiribathgoda Hospital and the Colombo National Hospital.
The victims aged 30 and 31-years were residents of Peliyagoda.
Police suspect that the shooting was the result of a dispute between two organized criminal gangs.
